short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add sparkling effects to your photos, create magical animations and videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Glitterboo is a fun site for adding photo-realistic sparkling effects to your pictures. It works with both graphics and photos, and you can download the results as images, animated GIF files or MP4 videos.

Pictures with a mixture of light and dark areas work especially well with the effect.

There is a gallery of photos and animations using the effects on the site.

**** Please note: The site is free - no signup needed - for basic effects and resolutions - just click on a category and press the "Demo" button at the bottom right of the category page, or upload a photo ****

High resolution downloads and more photo effects are available for site members at a price of $8.99 for a one year membership.

Glitterboo uses an all-Javascript interface so can be used on energy efficient devices such as ChromeBooks and NetBooks. We recommend using Glitterboo with the Google Chrome browser.

** New in version 2.0 - Save as Video with soundtrack option for members, improved tablet & touchscreen compatible editing screen, new pen tool & more
